1451.T.summary: KHC Ltd. engages in construction and real estate businesses in Japan. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Akashi, Japan. KHC Ltd. is a subsidiary of Japan Asia Group Co., Ltd.

1766.T.summary: Token Corporation operates as a construction company in Japan. It is involved in the design, construction, operation, and management of apartment buildings and rental condominiums; and construction of general and commercial lease properties. The company also provides tenant recruitment and property management services for rental apartments, condominiums, and retail outlets; and real estate agency services. In addition, it engages in the hotel, advertising, and information businesses. Token Corporation was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan.

1814.T.summary: Daisue Construction Co., Ltd. engages in the construction and real estate businesses in Japan. It is involved in the construction of condominiums; and office, logistics warehouse, factory, medical treatment, ceremonial occasion, etc. The company also repairs, and reinstalls/refurbishes existing buildings. In addition, it is involved in general worker dispatch, paid employment, security, consulting, residential building trading, general insurance agency, and coin parking businesses; and research and development on construction civil work. The company was founded in 1937 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

1847.T.summary: Ichiken Co., Ltd. engages in the construction business in Japan. The company rents and leases buildings; develops housing facilities; and involved in the urban environment projects. It also plans, designs, develops, constructs, administrates, and supervises commercial facilities and stores. The company was formerly known as Daiichi Kensetsu Corporation Ltd. and changed its name to Ichiken Co., Ltd. in 1989. Ichiken Co., Ltd. was founded in 1930 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

1925.T.summary: Daiwa House Industry Co., Ltd. engages in the construction business worldwide. It operates through Single-Family Houses; Rental Housing; Condominiums; Existing Homes; Commercial Facilities; Logistics, Business and Corporate Facilities; and Other Businesses segments. The company constructs single-family houses; rents houses; develops, manages, and sells condominiums; purchases, renovates, and resells existing homes; develops commercial facilities; develops and constructs logistics, business, and corporate facilities; and provides real estate agency services. It also manufactures steel and timber housing parts; offers ground survey and reinforcement services; and constructs retail and wholesale, medical and nursing care, office and factory, urban development and industrial park, energy, environmental greening, agriculture, parking and carsharing, and public-private partnership facilities. In addition, the company operates resort hotels and golf courses, business and city hotels, fitness clubs and aesthetic salons, and home centers; provides robotics technologies for use in hospitals, care facilities, factories, and construction sites; manages private homes for the elderly and assisted-living residential facilities for seniors; and offers parking, advertising, travel agency, information technology, and credit card and insurance agency services. Daiwa House Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1947 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

2981.T.summary: Landix Inc. engages in the real estate matching/consulting, custom housing matching/consulting, real estate development, and real estate tech platform development/operation businesses in Japan. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3299.T.summary: MUGEN ESTATE Co.,Ltd. purchases and resells used real estate properties in Japan. The company operates through Real Estate Trading Business, and Real Estate Leasing and Other Business segments. Its property portfolio includes residential-type and investment-type properties, including condominiums, office blocks, buildings, and apartments; and detached houses. The company is also involved in property leasing; interior and exterior refurbishment; property brokerage; and property management businesses. MUGEN ESTATE Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

5280.T.summary: Yoshicon Co.,Ltd. processes and sells building and environmental materials. The company also engages in civil engineering and building fortifications; and provides construction supervision services. In addition, it is involved in real estate development and securitization activities. The company was founded in 1949 and is based in Shizuoka, Japan.

6064.T.summary: Actcall Inc. engages in the real estate business in Japan. It provides living life related outsourcing services, such as emergency rush and call center services. The company also offers payment solutions for real estate rental management companies and real estate owners, as well as engages in the fintech business. In addition, it operates real estate rental properties, as well as provides office management services. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

8886.T.summary: Wood Friends Co.,Ltd. plans, develops, and sells real estate properties in Japan. The company designs, constructs, sells, and services wood houses and residential condominium; and provides real estate brokerage and house consultancy services. It is also involved in the land procurement business. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in Nagoya, Japan.

8887.T.summary: Riberesute Corporation engages in real estate and construction businesses in Japan. It develops condominiums and housing projects; and undertakes hot spring development projects. It is also involved in the sale of residential properties; and provision of real estate distribution, order construction, and renovation activities. In addition, the company offers real estate sales, brokerage, and management services. Riberesute Corporation was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Soka, Japan.

CDCTF.summary: GOLDCREST Co.,Ltd. engages in the development and sale of new condominiums in Japan. It is also involved in the property agency, broking, and consulting services. The company was incorporated in 1968 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

DWAHF.summary: Daiwa House Industry Co., Ltd. engages in the construction business worldwide. It operates through Single-Family Houses; Rental Housing; Condominiums; Existing Homes; Commercial Facilities; Logistics, Business and Corporate Facilities; and Other Businesses segments. The company constructs single-family houses; rents houses; develops, manages, and sells condominiums; purchases, renovates, and resells existing homes; develops commercial facilities; develops and constructs logistics, business, and corporate facilities; and provides real estate agency services. It also manufactures steel and timber housing parts; offers ground survey and reinforcement services; and constructs retail and wholesale, medical and nursing care, office and factory, urban development and industrial park, energy, environmental greening, agriculture, parking and carsharing, and public-private partnership facilities. In addition, the company operates resort hotels and golf courses, business and city hotels, fitness clubs and aesthetic salons, and home centers; provides robotics technologies for use in hospitals, care facilities, factories, and construction sites; manages private homes for the elderly and assisted-living residential facilities for seniors; and offers parking, advertising, travel agency, information technology, and credit card and insurance agency services. Daiwa House Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1947 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.
